dcterms:creator: Norman Meuschke
Bela Gipp
Mario Lipinski
dcterms:description: A subset of PubMed Central containing full text documents from biomedicine and life sciences, maintained by the U.S. National Library of Medicine, consisting of 860,000 documents.
dcterms:title: PubMed Central Open Access Subset (PMCOS)

dcterms:creator: Norman Meuschke
Bela Gipp
Mario Lipinski
dcterms:description: A test collection used in the Genomics track of the TREC conference 2006, comprising approximately 160,000 Open Access biomedical full text articles.
dcterms:title: TREC Genomics Collection

dcterms:creator: Norman Meuschke
Bela Gipp
Mario Lipinski
dcterms:description: An open evaluation framework for citation-based similarity measures, providing scholar datasets, baseline measurement, and implementations of previous citation-based algorithms.
dcterms:title: CITREC
